title: The BIGGEST Gift Under the TREE II
body_text:
DODGEBALL CXX Match Announcement!
The climactical DODGEBALL CXX (120) season finale main event scheduled for January 5, 2008, will be revealed following Game 3! Keep your ears open for this shocker!
2007
GOLD AWARDS
Voting has begun for the pretigious year-end
Gold Awards
. Those who have not received a voting pamphlet will surely get one at ONE-SEVENTEEN.
Special CHRIS-MAS Soundtrack!
A special shout-out to the legendary Chris Adams who has produced one kick-ass holiday soundtrack for this 117th extravaganza. Yet another reason to attend!
JOHN vs. TOM
And of course the ginormous, never-before-witnessed blockbuster featuring two of the absolute greatest ever.
John Tronolone
will face
Tom Adams
at this once-a-year special event. Do not,
do not
, miss this!
body_html:
DODGEBALL CXX Match Announcement!
The climactical DODGEBALL CXX (120) season finale main event scheduled for January 5, 2008, will be revealed following Game 3! Keep your ears open for this shocker!

2007 GOLD AWARDS
Voting has begun for the pretigious year-end Gold Awards. Those who have not received a voting pamphlet will surely get one at ONE-SEVENTEEN.

Special CHRIS-MAS Soundtrack!
A special shout-out to the legendary Chris Adams who has produced one kick-ass holiday soundtrack for this 117th extravaganza. Yet another reason to attend!

JOHN vs. TOM
And of course the ginormous, never-before-witnessed blockbuster featuring two of the absolute greatest ever. John Tronolone will face Tom Adams at this once-a-year special event. Do not, do not, miss this!
